name: Approve-All-JoinRequests
description: Approve all pending join requests on your telegram channel with using user session

API_ID.description: Your telegram API ID, Get it from my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Your telegram API HASH, Get it from my.telegram.org

SESSION.description: pyrogram v2 session string ⚠️ v2 required ⚠️

CHANNELS.description: ID of you Groups or channels (seperate by spaces). This variable is command work only in your group
